basics.name: Not Provided
basics.label: CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
basics.summary: Award-winning executive and marketing professional experienced in high-volume, multi-unit, retail and business operations in the pharmaceutical, financial services, and food and beverage industries. Demonstrated expertise in brand development, territory management, sales operations, product launches, recruiting, and business development, utilizing technology to improve organizational efficiency. Desires a high- level marketing position in a professional corporate environment.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Developed and launched Greenie Tots, a full-line of children's entrees, currently sold in mass retail including Whole Foods, Giant Eagle, Safeway, and independent grocery stores across the United States. Headed online/retail marketing campaigns to drive traffic and business to our online website and into our retail stores. Hired & trained all new brand ambassadors that marketed and sold the Greenie Tots brand to consumers & retail outlets. Managed production setup and distribution with the largest national natural products distributor UNFI. Developed company wide incentive performance plans which motivated staff and resulted in a 70% increase in sales. Rolled out integrated advertising campaigns across multiple media channels. Increased profits by 60% in one year through restructure of business line.
highlights: Increased annual sales to nearly $5.7 million through strategic marketing & sales campaigns.
Launched aggressive growth plans that helped increase customer base from 0 to 15,000 customers.
Created strategies to develop and expand existing customer sales, which resulted in a 200% sales growth in less than 12 months.
Grew a targeted newsletter subscriber list from 0 to 6,000 members in just 12 months.
Earned the Winner's Circle Award in 2008.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsibilities included handling a portfolio of billion dollar revenue medications, increasing sales in Fort Lauderdale, FL territory by 67% reaching territory sales of $5.7 million, developing and maintaining networks/partnerships with external partners, assisting the District Manager with the development and leadership for district strategy for product launches, sales initiatives, and team motivational activities, and developing strategic pharmacy initiatives to foster customer relationships and positive formulary acceptance.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Tasks included developing and maintaining monthly expense budget reports for the entire Managed Care sales force (NHO) to evaluate budget spending & allocation of resources, collaborating with external partners, spearheading the design, development, and implementation of branding the Manage Care division of Pfizer.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Maintained partnerships with external customers such as school institutions, businesses, and Bank of America customers. Developed and maintained a customer database with current, client investment positions and future investment goals.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Analyzed and developed industry reports using Information Resources Inc, for the Marketing and Sales department to track current product sales against previous sales performance. Developed a database system to track the positioning and sales of the newly launched product Rick's Spiked Lemonade.

skills.name: Microsoft Office (Excel, Power Point, and Access expertise)
